title: Did Boyd Bushman provide evidence of space contact?
subtitle: "People really believe that people are 100% honest on their deathbed, so I'm going to make sure to go out with the explosion and confirm my wonderful demands again."
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The former engineer of Lockheed Martin Boyd Bushman provided evidence of human contact with the lives of aliens prior to his death in August 2014.
